DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine local skin safety topical analgesic spray contain combination diclofenac , methyl salicylate , menthol compare topical analgesic gel contain combination diclofenac , methyl salicylate , menthol .
DOC.brief_title: Local Skin Safety Study Topical Pain Relief Spray Containing Combination Diclofenac , Methyl Salicylate , Menthol
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Healthy male female volunteer age least 18 year . 2 . Good general , physical mental health opinion investigator medically qualify designee : No clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history upon physical examination . Absence condition could affect volunteer 's safety well ability understand follow study procedures requirement . 3 . Healthy volunteer excessive hair volar aspect forearm ( ) . 4 . Healthy volunteer understand willing fully comply study procedure restriction . 5 . Demonstrates understand study willingness participate evidence voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form . 6 . Females childbearing potential , use effective contraceptive method least one month begin study , willing use throughout study Exclusion Criteria 1 . Volunteers recent history ( within one year ) alcohol substance abuse determine medical history . 2 . Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit . 3 . Previous participation similar study similar product . 4 . Volunteer visible skin disease site application , opinion investigator , interfere skin assessment . 5 . Volunteer current relevant previous history serious , severe unstable physical psychiatric illness , medical disorder , current previous history hepatic renal disease ( impairment ) peptic ulcer determine medical history . 6 . Volunteer history hypersensitivity ( e.g . asthma , bronchospasm , rhinitis , urticaria , nasal polyp ) aspirin , diclofenac , non steroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , menthol excipients test product ( ) . 7 . Volunteer receive systemic topical NSAIDs , oral topical analgesic antihistamine within 3 day visit 1 , medication ( corticosteroid within 3 week visit 1 ) , opinion investigative personnel , interfere study result . 8 . Female volunteer pregnant , plan become pregnant study , breastfeed . 9 . Female volunteer positive pregnancy test . 10 . Volunteers employee sponsor study site immediate family member ( e.g . partner , offspring , parent , sibling sibling 's offspring ) employee . 11 . Any skin disorder test site investigator 's judgement affect reading test result 12 . Any concomitant medication investigator 's judgement confound alter test result evaluation adverse event .
